You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Describing age & birthdays
gone adjective
(LEFT)
[ after verb ] If something is gone, there is none of it left: All my money is gone and I have nothing to buy food with.
[ after verb ] dead: dead and gone Fortunately I'll be dead and gone long before the money runs out.too far gone They did everything they could to save him, but he was already too far gone (= too close to death) when the ambulance arrived.
